name: Color Symphony 2
description: Color Symphony 2 is a puzzle action platformer that utilizes the ambiguity of color. Try to eliminate obstacles or find new paths by using color!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card with shader model 2.0 support DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: Very fun game!   kinda hard but still a really great game.
